40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ali bin Abu Talib:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Whoever is penalized (for a crime) then his punishment has been hastened for him in the world, for Allah is more just than to double the punishment upon His slave in the Hereafter. And whoever does a punishable act and then Allah covers it for him and forgives him, then Allah is more kind than to recount something which He has already forgiven

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ يَزْنِي الزَّانِي وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About "The Adulterer Does Not Commit Adultery While He Is A Believer"
